name: Sorry About The Mess
Lore: '''I''ve been looking forward to this for a long time.'' ''Yes, I''ll bet you have.'' Han abruptly ended his conversation with Greedo and flipped Wuher a credit to pay for the cleanup.',
Text: 'During your control phase, fire one of your weapons. If Han firing, may add 1 to each weapon destiny draw. (A seeker may be targeted by a character weapon using defense value of 4.) Any ''hit'' targets are immediately lost.',
